name: E-Ledger Turkey

name: Yard

name: EMRA WebSite
description:
EMRA WebSite is reporting platform for EMRA (EPDK) for fuels Turkey.
EPDK 1240 Web
EMRA reporting tool; (OTP&FIFO related) web based (SG9000018)
Rationalisation:
Short to medium term is to:
- Bring in to Midstream portfolio along with the other Turkey Oacle apps developed by NAS organisation
- migrate these applications off the current Oracle platform 
- move to a supported strategic platform. 
Longer term is to move to a strategic ERP solution which can incorporate these apps
